@usedefault

{{user id:$$id}}

h2. User: ${id}

{{actions:
- display: Update Password
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/user/updatePassword
  data:
   username: ${id}
  input:
  - password

- display: Send Reset Password Link
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/user/sendResetPasswordLink
  data:
   username: ${id}
   email: ${emails}

- display: Delete
  action: /restmachine/cloudbroker/user/delete
  data:
   username: ${id}
  input:
  - reason
}}

h3. Details
|*Emails*|${emails}|
|*Password Hash*|${passwd}|
|*Domain*|${domain}|
|*Roles*|${roles}|
|*Groups*|${groups}|
|*Last Checked*|${lastcheck}|
|*Grid ID*|[${gid}|/Grid/grid?id=${gid}]|
|*Active*|${active}|
|*Description*|${description}|

h3. CloudSpaces

{{cbspacesusers: userId:$$id}}
